changes: Bluetooth notifications (ie. with a Pebble watch) should now work correctly when Abstergo is installed (and even support reminders!)
Fixed a crash when answering phone calls with reminders added to the lock screen
Fixed some compatibility issues with biteSMS, Action Menu, and Bulletin
Fixed a rare crash when clearing Passbook notifications on the lock screen
Fixed an issue with themes where some of Abstergo's images weren't theme-able
Fixed a crash when clearing all notifications from the lock screen with QuickReply for WhatsApp / Viber installed
Fixed a rare crash when clearing certain notifications from the Notification Center
Fixed a rare issue where unlocking the device after cancelling clearing of all notifications would cause the device not to unlock
Improved translations for Greek, Japanese, Hebrew, Slovakian, Slovenian, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Italian, and more
Fixed an issue where pending Calendar events and pending Reminders would not produce an alert sound or vibration when a notification reminder expired
